Package fko.chessly.ui.SwingGUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutDialog
    GPL Dislaimer "Chessly by Frank Kopp" Copyright (c) 2003-2015 Frank Kopp mail-to:frank@familie-kopp.de This file is part of "Chessly by Frank Kopp".
    AbstractDialog
    An abstract dialog class.
    BoardPanel
    The BoardPanel class displays the board of a given game.
    ClockPanel
    Displays the player's clocks
    Command
    This class represents a Method, the list of arguments to be passed to that method, and the object on which the method is to be invoked.
    CommandAction  
    EngineInfoPanel  
    EngineThreadsDialog  
    GridBagHelper
    This class provides some helper methods for the GridBagLayout Manager.
    HelperTools
    This class just provides some helper utilities and cannot be instanciated.
    InfoPanel
    A panel with a textarea to show information like move list etc.
    MainMenu
    This class implements the main menu bar
    MainWindow
    This class represents the main window (JFrame) itself
    MoveList
    This class shows a list of moves in a table within a JScrollpane.
    MVController
    This class acts a the MVC controller an handles all user input actions.
    NewGameDialog
    This dialog is shown when the user clicked on New Game in Menu Game or Ctrl+N to start a new game.
    SatelliteWindow
    The SatelliteWindow class extends a JDialog mainly with the ability to store its window position with the help of ReversiGUI.getWindowState().
    StatusPanel
    This class represents the windows status bar
    SwingGUI
    Graphical User Interface for the Chessly game.
    WindowState
